verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הָ֭עַמִּים <WH5971> all ye people תִּקְעוּ־ <WH8628> O clap כָ֑ף <WH3709> your hands הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> shout לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> unto God בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> with the voice רִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> of triumph

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD עֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> most high נוֹרָ֑א <WH3372> [is] terrible מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> King גָּ֝דוֹל <WH1419> [he is] a great עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> over all the earth

יַדְבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> He shall subdue עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> the people תַּחְתֵּ֑ינוּ <WH8478> under וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> under us and the nations תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under רַגְלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH7272> under our feet

יִבְחַר־ <WH977> He shall choose לָ֥נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתֵ֑נוּ <WH5159> our inheritance אֶ֥ת <WH853> גְּא֨וֹן <WH1347> for us the excellency יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אָהֵ֣ב <WH157> whom he loved סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> is gone up אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> God בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> with a shout יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> of a trumpet
זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> Sing praises אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> to God זַמֵּ֑רוּ <WH2167> sing praises זַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> sing praises לְמַלְכֵּ֣נוּ <WH4428> unto our King זַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH2167> sing praises

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [is] the King כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> For God זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> sing ye praises מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> with understanding

מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigneth אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> God עַל־ <WH5921> over גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> over the heathen אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God יָשַׁ֤ב ׀ <WH3427> sitteth עַל־ <WH5921> over כִּסֵּ֬א <WH3678> upon the throne קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> of his holiness

נְדִ֘יבֵ֤י <WH5081> The princes עַמִּ֨ים ׀ <WH5971> of the people נֶאֱסָ֗פוּ <WH622> are gathered together עַם֮ <WH5971> [even] the people אֱלֹהֵ֪י <WH430> of the God אַבְרָ֫הָ֥ם <WH85> of Abraham כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> [belong] unto God מָֽגִנֵּי־ <WH4043> for the shields אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth מְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> he is greatly נַעֲלָֽה׃ <WH5927> exalted
